                                                :name (n6 / name
                                                      :op1 "Pfizer"))
                                          :op2 (c6 / company

                                                      :op1 "Moderna"))))))))
      :snt3 (c7 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (d / desire-01
                  :ARG0 (p2 / person

                              :ARG1 (c8 / country

                  :ARG1 (t2 / this

                  :ARG0 d
                  :ARG0 p2
                  :ARG1 (s2 / so))))
